General.Name: Xi an Bright Laser Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Xi'an Bright Laser Technologies Co.,Ltd. offers metal additive manufacturing and repairing solutions in the People's Republic of China. The company offers customized products, equipment, raw materials, software, and 3D printing and other technical services. It serves various industries, including aviation, aerospace, energy, medical, dental, tooling, automotive, and others. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Xi'an, the People's Republic of China.
